rationale: The species is only known from two streams on Hong Kong Island and three  streams on Lantau Island (Hong Kong) (Cai and Ng 1999, Yam and Dudgeon 2005, W. Klotz, pers com. 2012). The streams from which the species is known are all within Country  Parks, affording some protection to the species from encroaching  urbanization. It is however acknowledged that the species inhabits a very small area (EOO far less than 100 km<sup>2</sup>) and given that its entire known distribution is within a major urban conglomeration, the species is considered to be Near Threatened (close to meeting VU D2).
